name: SCNIKConstraint
desc: A constraint that applies inverse kinematics to make a chain of nodes “reach” toward a target point.

items.name: init(chainRootNode: SCNNode)
items.desc: Initializes an inverse kinematics constraint whose chain of nodes begins with the specified node.

items.name: class func inverseKinematicsConstraint(chainRootNode: SCNNode) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an inverse kinematics constraint whose chain of nodes begins with the specified node.

items.name: var chainRootNode: SCNNode
items.desc: The parent node of the hierarchy affected by the constraint.

items.name: func maxAllowedRotationAngle(forJoint: SCNNode) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Returns the rotation limit, in degrees, for the specified node.

items.name: func setMaxAllowedRotationAngle(CGFloat, forJoint: SCNNode)
items.desc: Sets the rotation limit, in degrees, for the specified node.

items.name: var targetPosition: SCNVector3
items.desc: The desired position for the constrained node, in the scene’s world coordinate space. Animatable.
